name: Real MMA Boxer Fighting
description:
Real MMA Boxer Fighting will give you experience of ninja punch boxing & kung fu karate fights in HD quality in combo fighting game play. Real MMA Boxer Fighting is designed especially for kung fu karate fighting lovers and punch boxing lovers from all around the world. Join the battle of rivals as a ninja warrior assassin fights

Features:
- 3D ninja boxing warriors
- Realistic Boxing ring
- Amazing Animations of 3D Characters
- Background Music and Background Sound
